dmca.title: ArticleInsider Claims 52 More Infringements Inside Google Search
dmca.body:
Content Infringement Notice
Attn: DMCA complaints
On behalf of
Articlelnsider.com
5/25/2005
Contact Info:
Infosearch Media, Inc.
[private]
Marina Del Rey, CA 90292
Phone: [private]
Fax: [private]
Attn: [Private] at [private]@infosearchmedia.com

Incident#34
I. The copyrighted work at issue is the article "Utilizing Kitchen Islands" by Nicole Garlock posted on the Article Insider web site at http://furniture.articleinsider.com/150571_kitchen_islands.html
Search Query: "There are many useful tools in the kitchen but the ones that provide the most use are kitchen islands."
Infringing Web Pages: http://www.professionalkitchenware.com/elegantisland.html
My email: [private]@infosearchmedia.com 
Address: Infosearch Media, Inc. [private] Marina Del Rey, CA 90292 
Phone: [private]
Email of infringing website: N/A
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
I sweat, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Signature
Fax to:[private]
